column1: Weighted MRI size (256, 128, 1) in T2, showing the skull of a person a man of 37 years old, of axial section n°199 starting from the base of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 83.0566 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 47.4609 mm³.
